patthana18.23:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the teachings,)
patthana18.23:0.3_0: this is the cause, this is the reason for the sake of grasping.
patthana18.23:1.1_0: Because of grasping there is no cause or condition for the sake of grasping.
patthana18.23:2.1_0: Corrupt principles, not for the sake of corruption.
